value.author: did:plc:vzsvtbtbnwn22xjqhcu3vd6y
value.content:
うん、そうだね。その分類は非常にわかりやすい。
個人開発だと、2dゲームは大変だけど、でも3dよりも圧倒的にやることを限定できるので、個人開発で3dはやるべきじゃないなと思ったよ。

en.content:
Yeah, that's right. That classification is very easy to understand.
For solo development, 2D games are tough, but you can overwhelmingly limit what needs to be done compared to 3D, so I thought solo developers shouldn't do 3D.
